column1: The '''Gilminuial''' is a ship of the [[Rangers of the North]] under the command of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Evendim#Aranhir
column2: Aranhir]]. The ships sails up and down the [[Baranduin]] to provide many much-needed suplies for the [[Wardens of Ann√∫minas]] during their fights with the [[Angmarim]] and [[Tomb-robbers]].<ref name="shipwrecked mariners">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], ''The Tale of the Shipwrecked Mariners''</ref> In {{TA
column3: 3018}} they were beset by a storm. The ship was grounded and their supplies were lost, though the player recovered several of their supplies.<ref name="shipwrecked mariners"/> The crew were washed away, several at [[Evendim]] and some near [[Buckland]]. All members of the crew survived the ravage; with the aid of the player all members were found, and started to repair the Gilminuial.<ref name="shipwrecked mariners"/>
